db:info.db:title: Bluetooth Low Energy Heart Rate Server Example

db:abstract.db:para: An example demonstrating how to set up and advertise a GATT service. The example demonstrates the use of the Qt Bluetooth Low Energy classes related to peripheral (slave) functionality.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = heartrate-server
QT += bluetooth CONFIG += c++11
SOURCES += main.cpp
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/bluetooth/heartrate-server INSTALLS += target
